response.value: (options) => { 	if (options.context) { 		let user = options.context.currentContext.Authorization; 		if (user.indexOf('client') === 0) { 			return "客户端" 		} else if (user.indexOf('root') === 0) { 			return "管理端" 		} 	} }

(options) => { 	if (options.context) { 		let user = options.context.currentContext.Authorization; 		if (user.indexOf('client') === 0) { 			return "2c9180895e172348015e188b362c0027" 		} else if (user.indexOf('root') === 0) { 			return "2c9180895e172348015e1740805d000d" 		} 	} }

(options) => { if (options.context) { let user = options.context.currentContext.Authorization; if (user.indexOf('client') === 0) { return [{ "id": "2c9180895e172348015e1857eb460020", "name": "首页", "parent_id": null, "route": "/", "summary": null },{"id": "2c9180895e172348015e1857eb460025", "name": "商品管理", "parent_id": "2c9180895e172348015e1857eb460020", "route": "goods", "summary": null }, { "id": "2c9180895e172348015e18586a980026", "name": "商品信息", "parent_id": "2c9180895e172348015e1857eb460025", "route": "list", "summary": null }] } else if (user.indexOf('root') === 0) { return [{ "id": "2c9180895e172348015e1857eb460020", "name": "首页", "parent_id": null, "route": "/", "summary": null },{ "id": "2c9180895e13261e015e13469b7e0000", "name": "平台-角色管理", "parent_id": "2c9180895e172348015e1857eb460020", "route": "roles", "summary": null }, { "id": "2c9180895e13261e015e1346d40a0001", "name": "平台-账户管理", "parent_id": "2c9180895e172348015e1857eb460020", "route": "accounts", "summary": null }] } } }
